thing.title: Cupcake Cupcake
thing.author: MaskedRetriever
thing.description: At Bre Pettis' request, I have made a cupcake model that the CupCake can print out. I've included a version with and one without a candle holder, in addition, there's a mini version because I figured there'd be no harm in uploading a version that prints the size of a die or so.
